page.title: 03THE MILL WEST ASHLING
page.content: The mill is next to a large millpond. It is divided into three parts_living space, a workshop and a gallery.The mill has three main floors and a small atic on the top.The gallery is open every day of the week apart from Monday,Tuesday and Sunday.The gallery sells many{craft articles}including paintings,pottery,jewellery and wallhangings.Five different people work in the mill workshops all producing articles to sell.The mill was derelict and neglected until three years ago,it was auctioned,bought,and is now being repaired by one person. The mill has ten acres of land,with four horses,two sheep,five chickens and an apple orchard. {
